headline: Why Dexcom Is On A Six-Day Losing Spree — But This Analyst Isn't Worried
summary: Dexcom stock plunged to a four-month low Monday after the FDA issued a warning letter tied to inspections of two facilities in the U.S.

headline: DexCom Stock Drops as Diabetes Devices Maker Gets FDA Warning Letter
summary: DexCom received a warning letter from the Food and Drug Administration following inspections of two of its plants.

headline: Dexcom receives warning letter based on FDA inspections of 2 plants
summary: The company does not expect the warning letter to materially impact its manufacturing capacity, sales or ability to seek clearance for new products.

headline: DexCom (NasdaqGS:DXCM) Shares Dip 1% Despite 7% Sales Growth
summary: DexCom (NasdaqGS:DXCM) recently received a warning letter from the FDA, which pointed out issues in manufacturing processes and quality management. While these regulatory developments did not impact its ability to produce or distribute products, they may have influenced investor sentiment. The announcement came after a quarter where DexCom reported a 7% increase in sales, though net income declined significantly alongside a reduction in earnings per share. During the past quarter, major...
